name: react-explorer
description: Boilerplate for ReactJS project with hot code reloading

scripts.start: watchify -t [ loose-envify --NODE_ENV development ] -t babelify -t aliasify -o lib/bundle.js -v -d src/index.js
scripts.prepublish: babel ./src --out-dir ./lib --source-maps --presets es2015,react,stage-0 --plugins babel-plugin-add-module-exports && browserify ./lib/Explorer.js -o ./build/react-explorer.js --transform browserify-global-shim --standalone ReactExplorer && uglifyjs ./build/react-explorer.js --compress --mangle --output ./build/react-explorer.min.js --source-map ./build/react-explorer.min.js.map
scripts.build: browserify -e src/Explorer.js -p [browserify-resolutions 'react'] -t [ loose-envify --NODE_ENV production ] -t babelify -t aliasify | uglifyjs -cm > lib/bundle.js
scripts.demo: npm run compile && browserify demo/Examples.jsx -d -t -o demo/bundle.js && http-server -a localhost -p 8000 -c-1

author: pcdv
